law.catch_line: After a death sentence is imposed and the judgment becomes final, the Court of Appeals shall review ...

section.section: After a death sentence is imposed and the judgment becomes final, the Court of Appeals shall review the sentence on the record.
The Court of Appeals shall consolidate an appeal from the verdict with the sentence review.

text.section:
The clerk of the trial court shall send to the Clerk of the Court of Appeals:
the entire record and the transcript of the sentencing proceeding within 10 days after receiving the transcript;
the determination and written findings of the court or jury; and
a report of the trial court that:
is in the form of a standard questionnaire supplied by the Court of Appeals; and
includes a recommendation by the trial court as to whether the death sentence is justified.
The defendant and the State may submit briefs and present oral arguments to the Court of Appeals within the time allowed by the Court.

section.section: In addition to any error properly before the Court on appeal, the Court of Appeals shall consider the imposition of the death sentence.

With regard to the death sentence, the Court of Appeals shall determine whether:
the imposition of the death sentence was influenced by passion, prejudice, or any other arbitrary factor;
the evidence supports the finding by the court or jury of a statutory aggravating circumstance under § 2-303(g) of this title; and
the evidence supports a finding by the court or jury that the aggravating circumstances outweigh the mitigating circumstances under § 2-303(h) and (i)(1) of this title.

In addition to its review under any direct appeal, with regard to the death sentence, the Court of Appeals shall:
affirm the death sentence;
set the death sentence aside and remand the case for a new sentencing proceeding under § 2-303 of this title; or
set the death sentence aside and remand the case for modification of the sentence to imprisonment for life.

text.section: The Court of Appeals may adopt rules of procedure for the expedited review of death sentences under this section.
